title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Index Declines 6.8% as All Assets Trade Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Solana (SOL) fell 12.5% and Sui (SUI) dropped 10.1%, leading index lower.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2425.32, down 6.8% (-176.31) since 4 p.m. ET on Wednesday.

None of the 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: BCH (-3.5%) and BTC (-4.7%).

Laggards: SOL (-12.5%) and SUI (-10.1%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The entire CoinDesk 20 Index declined 6.8% with all 20 assets trading lower, led by significant drops in SOL (-12.5%) and SUI (-10.1%).
